techmeme.title: Colorado-based AMP Robotics, which uses AI and robotics to sort municipal solid waste, raised a $91M Series D led by Congruent Ventures (The Robot Report)
Google releases new Android features, including "expressive" video captions, improvements to the Pixel Screenshots app, a Spotify extension for Gemini, and more (Igor Bonifacic/Engadget)
Bluesky CEO Jay Graber says it is not "necessarily true" that Bluesky will always be ad-free; ads could be "user intent-driven", like running in search results (Maxwell Zeff/TechCrunch)
Billionaire tech critic Frank McCourt says his Project Liberty initiative has secured $20B in informal commitments to fund his "people's bid" to buy TikTok (Sara Fischer/Axios)
OpenAI launches o1 out of preview for ChatGPT Plus and Team users, with support for image uploads and a 34% reduction in major errors on difficult problems (Carl Franzen/VentureBeat)
